extended_tweet.full_text:
"Quiet quitting" is not a positive movement in the world of work. It’s a silent killer of hopes & dreams, as well as productivity & success.

Workers are feeling disappointed, discouraged, and stuck. Employers are bleeding staff and dollars. Nobody is winning.

#QuietQuitting

extended_tweet.full_text:
I think the most interesting thing about #QuietQuitting is the power of naming things. 

This has long been a phenomenon but when you name something, it’s easier to talk about, share and it grows in social status.
